name: SCALLOPERS CAMPAIGN
sampleDescriptions: Outreach to Members of Congress and NOAA staff regarding scallop permit leasing program. Fiscal Year 2023 advocacy related to scallop fisheries issues in House and Senate Appropriations bills for Comm
Congressional and Administration outreach related to a permit leasing proposal and scoping process in the New England Limited Access sea scallop fishery.
